scene_description_enriched: The upper register depicts a dramatic scene under a starry night sky with a crescent moon. A figure in a brown robe, possibly a prophet or saint, kneels in prayer on a rocky outcrop, looking towards the heavens. Below, a group of soldiers, some holding lanterns and torches, are apprehending a man. One soldier, in red armor, is on his knees, seemingly wounded or captured, with blood dripping from his neck. Another soldier, in blue armor, is holding a lantern aloft, illuminating the chaotic scene. In the lower register, a procession of soldiers marches forward, some carrying spears. A decorative band with text and an illuminated initial separates the two registers. To the left of the text band, a small, dark building with a pitched roof and a window is visible. To the right, a figure in a golden robe stands near a wooden structure.
